trans-unit.source: Delete source file after encryption is complete
trans-unit.target: 加密完成後刪除原始文件

trans-unit.source: Video must be added to continue
trans-unit.target: 必須增加影片才能繼續

trans-unit.source: Please enter the password to unlock this PDF
Choose another app on this computer
trans-unit.target: 選擇此電腦上的其他應用程式

trans-unit.source: Use this app to open this type of file by default
trans-unit.target: 一律使用此程式來開啟檔案

trans-unit.source: Copy this link to your browser to download
trans-unit.target: 複製此連接至瀏覽器進行下載

trans-unit.source: The name already exists and cannot be added repeatedly
trans-unit.target: 此位置已有同名的檔案

trans-unit.source: Unable to get icon automatically, please try again
trans-unit.target: 無法自動取得圖標，請重試

trans-unit.source: Launch an app with a URI
trans-unit.target: 使用統一資源標誌符(URI)啟動程式

trans-unit.source: Your rating is very important, please take a minute or two to rate the app.
trans-unit.target: 您的評分對我非常重要!請花一點時間為該程式評分

trans-unit.source: Name cannot be empty and cannot contain illegal characters Illegal characters include \ / : * ? " < > |
trans-unit.target: 檔案名稱不能為空且不可以包含下列任意字元: \ / : * ? " < > |
應用程式保存設置及數據儲存

trans-unit.source: This field is required and cannot be left blank
The passwords entered are inconsistent, please check the passwords
trans-unit.target: 兩次輸入的密碼不一致，請重新檢查密碼

trans-unit.source: Use Windows Hello instead of password authentication
trans-unit.target: 使用Windows Hello代替密碼驗證

trans-unit.source: Click the button or drag the file here
trans-unit.target: 單擊按鈕或將檔案移動到此處

trans-unit.source: The AES-128-CBC mode already provides sufficient security by default, but you can also choose the AES-256-CBC mode for better security protection. Processors of the second generation Core processors and above support two modes of hardware acceleration, so there is no need to worry about performance issues
trans-unit.target: 預設狀況下，AES-128-CBC模式已經提供了足夠的安全性，但是您也可以選擇AES-256-CBC模式以獲得更好的安全保護。 Intel Core第二代處理器及更高版本的處理器支持兩種硬體加速模式，因此不需擔心性能的問題

trans-unit.source: Based on AES-CBC algorithm, combined with multiple system-level security authentication measures to ensure the secure storage of files
trans-unit.target: 基於AES-CBC算法及結合多種系統級安全認證措施，確保檔案安全無虞

trans-unit.source: Lock immediately when leaving this page
trans-unit.target: 離開此頁面時立即鎖定

trans-unit.source: Lock when this app is closing

trans-unit.target: 使用Windows Hello簡化身份驗證

trans-unit.source: Utilizing Windows Hello to strengthen the security of the security domain, Windows Hello saves the necessary credentials to the TPM security chip. The TPM chip is not affected by any software and hardware vulnerabilities, so these credentials will not be disclosed in any unauthorized state. RX utilizes this feature, combined with AES encryption, to provide unparalleled security protection
trans-unit.target: 使用Windows Hello增強加密目的安全性，Windows Hello將必要的憑據保存到TPM安全芯片。 TPM芯片不受任何軟件和硬件漏洞的影響，因此不會在任何未授權狀態下公開這些憑據。 RX利用此功能，結合AES加密，提供了無與倫比的安全保護

trans-unit.source: Acrylic transmittance determines how much light from the background is allowed to pass through the App's acrylic material. The smaller the value, the higher the Acrylic theme color ratio, and the higher the percentage of light from the background.
trans-unit.target: Acrylic透明度決定了背景透光度。 數值越小，透明主題比例越高，背景透光度的比例越高。

trans-unit.source: Acrylic theme color layer transparency, the larger the value, the lighter the Acrylic color, the smaller the color indicates the darker the color
trans-unit.target: 透明效果顏色的透明度，該數值越大，透明效果顏色越淺，越小表示顏色越深

trans-unit.source: Please specify the folder and click confirm
Unable to automatically determine library folder
trans-unit.target: 無法自動判定資料庫資料夾

trans-unit.source: Please specify the library folder manually
This time format is incorrect, please re-enter
trans-unit.target: 時間格式不正確，請重新輸入

trans-unit.source: Use the same encoding configuration as the source video
trans-unit.target: 使用與源視頻相同的編碼配置

trans-unit.source: Do not close this window during transmission
trans-unit.target: 傳輸期間請勿關閉此頁面

trans-unit.source: QuickLook is an auxiliary software for convenient and quick viewing of file contents. To enable this feature, you must install QuickLook in advance and ensure that QuickLook works properly. You can click on any file in the RX Explorer and press the space bar to activate QuickLook
trans-unit.target: QuickLook是一個輔助軟體，可方便快捷地查看檔案內容。若要啟用此功能，必須預先安裝QuickLook並確保QuickLook正常執行。 您可以在RX 檔案總管中單擊任意檔案，然後按空格鍵以使用QuickLook

trans-unit.source: This operation cannot be performed due to network reasons
trans-unit.target: 由於網絡原因無法執行此操作

trans-unit.source: You can try restarting the task
trans-unit.target: 您可以嘗試重新啟動該任務

trans-unit.note: Describe the available capacity and total capacity of the disk, such as "128GB free of 256GB"

trans-unit.source: Cannot convert image format due to missing encoder or unsupported operation
trans-unit.target: 由於缺少編碼器或不支持此操作，無法轉換圖像格式

trans-unit.source: You can try restarting the task
trans-unit.target: 您可以嘗試重新啟動該任務

trans-unit.source: You can try restarting the transcode

trans-unit.note: Example: FILE1 has been successfully transcoded to FILE2

trans-unit.source: Unable to find the specified resource, please check the URL
trans-unit.target: 找不到指定的資源，請檢查網址

trans-unit.source: Please select a paired device first
trans-unit.target: 請先選擇已配對的設備

trans-unit.source: Unable to connect to this Bluetooth device, please turn on the Bluetooth switch of this device
trans-unit.target: 無法連接到此藍牙設備，請打開此設備的藍牙

trans-unit.source: Unable to discover the ObexObjectPush service for Bluetooth devices, which is not supported
trans-unit.target: 無法發現支持藍牙設備的Obex Object Push服務

trans-unit.source: Unable to pair with this device
Please confirm that the PIN is the same as the paired device
trans-unit.target: 請確認PIN碼與配對的設備相同

trans-unit.source: Please confirm whether to pair with the device
trans-unit.target: 請確認是否與設備配對
RX 檔案總管提供基本的觀看功能

trans-unit.note: Format: [File Count] files, Example: 20 files (in folder)
Format: [Folder Count] folders, Example: 20 folders (in folder)

trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 檔案總管中開啟

trans-unit.source: Background tasks are disabled, RX will not be able to notify you in time when the update is released. Please manually enable background task permissions
trans-unit.target: 若禁用了背景運行，更新發佈時，RX 檔案總管將無法及時通知您。 請手動啟用背景運行權限

trans-unit.source: Unable to open purchase page due to Microsoft Store or network, please try again later
trans-unit.target: 由於Microsoft 商店或網路問題而無法打開購買頁面，請稍後再試

trans-unit.source: Cannot locate or access the folder, the folder does not exist or lacks access permissions
trans-unit.target: 無法找到或訪問該文件夾，該文件夾不存在或缺少訪問權限

trans-unit.source: RX Explorer is running some tasks, closing at this time may cause data errors, Do you want to continue?
trans-unit.target: RX 檔案總管正在運行某些任務，此時關閉可能會導致數據錯誤，是否要繼續？

trans-unit.source: 🎉You can support developers to continue to develop by purchasing this application.🎉\r\rIf you don't want to, you can click "Later" to cancel\rIf you want to purchase, you can click "Purchase" to purchase this application\r\rTips: Purchase can unlock the unique file safe feature: "Security Area"
trans-unit.target: 🎉您可以透過購買此應用程式來支持開發人員繼續開發。🎉\r\r如果不想，可以單擊“下次”取消\r如果要購買，可以單擊“購買”來購買此應用程序 應用程式\r\r提示：購買可以解鎖獨特的檔案安全功能：“加密庫”
trans-unit.note: Please keep all \r in this sentence after translate

trans-unit.source: Pin the RX-Explorer to StartScreen and TaskBar ！\r\r★Pin to StartScreen\r\r★Pin to TaskBar
trans-unit.target: 將RX 檔案總管釘選到[開始]和工作列！\r\r★釘選到[開始] \r\r★釘選到工作列
trans-unit.note: Please keep all \r in this sentence after translate

trans-unit.source: RX-Explorer will try to continue execution until terminated by Windows policy
trans-unit.target: RX-Explorer將嘗試繼續執行，直到被Windows策略終止

trans-unit.source: Some files do not exist and cannot be copyed to the specified location
trans-unit.target: 某些檔案不存在，無法將其複製到指定位置

trans-unit.source: This will delete everything in the folder. Whether to continue?
trans-unit.target: 這將刪除資料夾中的所有內容。 是否繼續？

trans-unit.source: Some files do not exist and cannot be moved to the specified location
trans-unit.target: 某些檔案不存在，無法將其移動到指定位置

trans-unit.target: 此資料夾已增加到主頁，不能再次增加

trans-unit.target: RX 檔案總管沒有新增資料夾的權限，可能是您沒有權限訪問此資料夾

RX does not have permission to paste

trans-unit.source: RX does not have permission to rename this file

trans-unit.source: RX cannot be turned on automatically because startup is disabled by the system\rYou can go to the [System Settings] page to manage
trans-unit.target: 無法啟動RX 檔案總管，因為系統已禁用啟動\r您可以轉到[設定]進行管理
trans-unit.note: Please keep all \r in this sentence after translate

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred while compressing the file
trans-unit.target: 壓縮檔案時時發生異常

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred while extracting the file
trans-unit.target: 解壓縮檔案時時發生異常

trans-unit.source: An unexpected error occurred while decrypting the file, the export process has ended
trans-unit.target: 解密檔案時發生意外錯誤

trans-unit.source: The decryption failed due to the wrong decryption password, the export task has been terminated \r\rThis may be caused by a mismatch in the data of the files to be decrypted
trans-unit.target: 由於解密密碼錯誤，解密失敗，任務終止\r\r這可能是由於要解密的檔案數據不匹配所致
trans-unit.note: Please keep all \r in this sentence after translate

trans-unit.source: This operation will delete these files. Whether to continue?
trans-unit.target: 此操作將刪除這些檔案。 是否繼續？

trans-unit.source: This operation will delete the file. Whether to continue?
trans-unit.target: 此操作將刪除這個檔案。 是否繼續？

trans-unit.source: Unable to delete some files/folders, the file/folders may have been moved or deleted
trans-unit.target: 無法刪除某些檔案/資料夾，該檔案/資料夾可能已移動或刪除

trans-unit.source: The selected content is not a drive
The target folder cannot be included in the drag item
trans-unit.target: 目標資料夾不能包含在拖動項目中

trans-unit.source: An unexpected error occurred while encrypting the file, the import process has ended
trans-unit.target: 加密檔案時發生意外錯誤

trans-unit.source: This operation cannot be performed due to network reasons
trans-unit.target: 由於網路原因無法執行此操作

trans-unit.source: The same feedback already exists, please do not submit it repeatedly
trans-unit.target: 已有相同的回饋，請不要重複提交

trans-unit.source: Because the internal structure of the file to be decrypted is damaged and the decryption fails, the export task has been terminated \r\rThis may be caused by the file data being damaged or modified
trans-unit.target: 因為要解密的檔案的內部結構已損壞並且解密失敗，所以導出任務已終止\r\r這可能是由於檔案的數據被損壞或修改引起的
trans-unit.note: Please keep all \r in this sentence after translate

trans-unit.target: 找不到相應的檔案，它可能已被移動或刪除

trans-unit.source: Security Area does not support importing folder, all folders have been filtered
trans-unit.target: 加密庫不支持移入資料夾，所有資料夾均已篩選

trans-unit.source: Thank you for your support of the RX Explorer, the security area has been unlocked
trans-unit.target: 感謝您對RX 檔案管理的支持，加密庫已解鎖

trans-unit.source: There is already an ongoing task, please wait for it to complete
trans-unit.target: 已經有一項正在進行的任務，請等待它完成

trans-unit.source: RX does not have permission to create the Zip file here, it may be that you do not have access to this file
trans-unit.target: RX 檔案管理沒有權限在此處新增Zip文件，可能是您沒有權限訪問此檔案

trans-unit.source: RX does not have sufficient permissions to create new files in this folder
trans-unit.target: RX 檔案總管沒有權限在此資料夾中新增檔案

trans-unit.source: RX does not have permission to decompression the Zip file here, it may be that you do not have access to this file
trans-unit.target: RX 檔案總管沒有在此處解壓Zip檔案的權限，可能是您沒有權限訪問此檔案

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred while deleting the file, the undo operation could not be completed
trans-unit.target: 由於某些檔案/資料夾不存在，因此復原操作無法完成

trans-unit.source: WIFI transmission has an unexpected error：\r
trans-unit.note: Please keep all \r in this sentence after translate

trans-unit.source: Windows Hello authentication failed, you do not have permission to enter the Security Area
trans-unit.target: Windows Hello身份驗證失敗，您無沒有權限進入加密庫

trans-unit.source: Windows Hello authentication credentials are lost, you cannot use Windows Hello, please use the password to enter \r\rAfter you re-enter the security domain, enter settings to re-register Windows Hello
trans-unit.target: Windows Hello身份驗證憑據丟失，無法使用Windows Hello，請使用密碼輸入\r\r重新進入加密庫後，輸入設定以重新註冊Windows Hello
trans-unit.note: Please keep all \r in this sentence after translate

trans-unit.source: Windows Hello is disabled and cannot enter the Security Area through Windows Hello
trans-unit.target: Windows Hello已禁用，無法通過Windows Hello進入加密庫

trans-unit.source: Windows Hello could not be set up correctly, please try again
trans-unit.target: Windows Hello無法正確設定，請重試

trans-unit.source: The image viewer failed to read any image file due to an abnormality in reading the image folder. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: 由於讀取圖像資料夾異常，圖片檢視器無法讀取任何圖像文件。 請再試一次。
RX 檔案管理內置檢視器

trans-unit.source: Special thanks to the following translators
trans-unit.target: 特別感謝以下翻譯人員

trans-unit.source: You have already purchased this application and cannot be purchased repeatedly
trans-unit.target: 您已經購買了此應用程式，無法重複購買

trans-unit.target: 無法取得剪貼簿的內容

trans-unit.source: Cannot contain illegal characters Illegal characters include \ / : * ? " < > |
trans-unit.target: 不可以包含下列任意字元 \ / : * ? " < > |

trans-unit.source: The name cannot be empty and cannot contain invalid names Invalid names include "CON","PRN", "AUX", "CLOCK$", "NUL" "COM0", "COM1", "COM2", "COM3", "COM4", "COM5", "COM6", "COM7", "COM8", "COM9" "LPT0", "LPT1", "LPT2", "LPT3", "LPT4", "LPT5", "LPT6", "LPT7", "LPT8", "LPT9"
trans-unit.target: 名稱不能為空，並且不能包含無效名稱 無效名稱包括 "CON","PRN", "AUX", "CLOCK$", "NUL" "COM0", "COM1", "COM2", "COM3", "COM4", "COM5", "COM6", "COM7", "COM8", "COM9" "LPT0", "LPT1", "LPT2", "LPT3", "LPT4", "LPT5", "LPT6", "LPT7", "LPT8", "LPT9"

trans-unit.source: The folder is already occupied and cannot be renamed
trans-unit.target: 該文件夾已被佔用，無法重命名

trans-unit.source: The file is already occupied and cannot be renamed
trans-unit.target: 該文件已被佔用，無法重命名

trans-unit.target: 該應用程序已無法找到，請重新設置可執行文件路徑

trans-unit.source: Unable to set the picture as wallpaper due to an unknown error
trans-unit.target: 由於未知錯誤，無法將圖片設置為牆紙

trans-unit.target: 由於設備或系統策略的原因，當前圖片無法設置為牆紙

trans-unit.source: The picture has been successfully set as wallpaper
trans-unit.target: 圖片已成功設置為牆紙

trans-unit.source: Need to choose a file or a folder?
trans-unit.target: 需要選擇檔案還是檔案夾？

trans-unit.source: Enter a description of the shortcut
Enter or browse the target path
Must contain [CurrentLocation], this parameter is used to instruct RX how to fill in the current folder location. Format: <Switch to directory command> [CurrentLocation]
trans-unit.target: 必須包含[CurrentLocation]，此參數用於指示RX如何填寫當前文件夾位置.。格式: <切換到目錄命令> [CurrentLocation]
創建或選擇一個配置文件
以管理員身份運行終端

trans-unit.source: Cannot access clipboard, copy/cut operation failed
trans-unit.target: 無法訪問剪貼板，複製/剪切操作失敗

trans-unit.source: Always start a new process when activated
trans-unit.target: 激活後始終啟動新流程

trans-unit.source: Turn off the initial animation to speed up the startup
trans-unit.target: 關閉初始動畫以加快啟動速度

trans-unit.source: It is detected that you have switched the dark background. To ensure the clarity of the text, whether to change the font color to white?
trans-unit.target: 檢測到您切換了深色背景，為了確保文本的清晰度，是否將字體顏色更改為白色？

trans-unit.source: It is detected that you have switched the light background, to ensure the clarity of the text, whether to change the font color to black?
trans-unit.target: 檢測到您切換了淺色背景，為了確保文本的清晰度，是否將字體顏色更改為黑色？

trans-unit.source: There is no log file to export
trans-unit.target: 沒有要導出的日誌文件

trans-unit.source: Checking this option can prevent the Windows from turning off the Acrylic effect when you are not using this application. In this mode, only the Acrylic transmittance is allowed to be adjusted, and the Acrylic color transparency is not available. Note: Turning on this option may shorten battery life, and continuous light calculation will increase the burden on the CPU
trans-unit.target: 不使用此應用程序時，選中此選項可以防止Windows關閉亞克力效果。 在此模式下，僅允許調整丙烯酸透射率，而丙烯酸顏色透明度不可用。 注意：打開此選項可能會縮短電池壽命，並且連續的光線計算會增加CPU的負擔

trans-unit.source: Load thumbnails for folders and files (Slower)
trans-unit.target: 加載文件夾和文件的縮略圖 (較慢)
不加載任何縮略圖 (更快)
僅加載文件的縮略圖 (平衡)

trans-unit.source: Unable to unlock Bitlocker, please check whether the password is correct and whether the administrator authority is granted
trans-unit.target: 無法解鎖Bitlocker，請檢查密碼是否正確以及是否授予管理員權限
使用內置的搜索引擎 (默認)

trans-unit.source: Everything search can bring an extremely fast search experience. If you need to use Everything, you need to \r 1. Install and run Everything\r 2. Purchase this software to unlock this feature
trans-unit.target: Everything搜索都可以帶來極其快速的搜索體驗。 如果需要使用Everything，則需要\r 1.安裝並運行Everything\r 2.購買此軟件以解鎖此功能

trans-unit.target: 請輸入Bitlocker密碼來解鎖驅動器

trans-unit.source: Cannot access this file due to lack of permissions
trans-unit.target: 由於權限不足，無法訪問此文件

trans-unit.target: 創建新的垂直拆分視圖
關閉除此以外所有選項卡

trans-unit.source: Waiting for user to complete operation...
Please turn on file system permissions. Then click on the launch below to start immediately
trans-unit.target: 請打開文件系統權限，然後點擊下面的啟動按鈕立即開始

trans-unit.source: Please enable file system access for this app to work properly\rThen restart the app
trans-unit.target: 請啟用此應用程序的文件系統訪問權限，以使其正常運行\r然後重新啟動該應用程序
trans-unit.note: Please keep all \r in this sentence after translate

trans-unit.target: 恢復上次打開的標籤頁

trans-unit.source: Open one or more specified tab
trans-unit.target: 打開一個或多個特定標籤頁

trans-unit.source: Skip the recycle bin and delete permanently
trans-unit.target: 跳過回收站並永久刪除

trans-unit.source: Which type do you want to choose?

This feature can help you share audio from other devices via Bluetooth and play it on this device. Note: You must first pair with other Bluetooth devices before using this function, otherwise the Bluetooth device will not be detected.
trans-unit.target: 此功能可以幫助您通過藍牙共享其他設備的音頻並在此設備上播放。 注意：使用此功能之前，必須先與其他藍牙設備配對，否則將無法檢測到藍牙設備。

trans-unit.source: This feature requires Win10 2004 or above
trans-unit.target: 此功能需要Win10 2004或更高版本

trans-unit.source: Connection timeout, the device does not respond
Windows refused to establish a connection
Unable to paste operation, unsupported file source
trans-unit.target: 無法粘貼操作，不支持的文件源
在垂直拆分視圖中打開

trans-unit.source: RX does not support viewing this drive because its path is empty
trans-unit.target: RX不支持查看此驅動器，因為其路徑為空

trans-unit.source: Do you want to save the last item you copied so that it will continue to be available after the application is closed? This may take some time, and the app will automatically close when finished
trans-unit.target: 您是否要保存最後復制的項目，以便在關閉應用程序後繼續可用？ 這可能需要一些時間，應用會在完成後自動關閉

trans-unit.source: Remember my choice and don't remind me next time
trans-unit.target: 記住我的選擇，下次不提醒我

trans-unit.source: Must be a valid file folder path
trans-unit.target: 必須是有效的文件夾路徑

trans-unit.source: How do you unlock the occupation?
Click "Request to close" to notify the application that is using this file to exit, and the application can save all data
trans-unit.target: 單擊“請求關閉”以通知正在使用此文件的應用程序退出，並且該應用程序可以保存所有數據

trans-unit.source: Click "Force to close" to exit the application immediately, and all unsaved data will be lost
trans-unit.target: 單擊“強制關閉”立即退出應用程序，所有未保存的數據都將丟失

trans-unit.source: Always pops up the panel after a new task was created
trans-unit.target: 創建新任務後始終彈出面板

trans-unit.source: If you are plugged in, you can ignore this notification
trans-unit.target: 如果您已插入電源，則可以忽略此通知

trans-unit.source: Hidden system files should not be modified, it is recommended not to turn on this switch, whether to continue?

trans-unit.target: 導入配置失敗，出現意外錯誤

trans-unit.target: 請重新啟動應用程序以激活新配置。 您也可以繼續使用此應用，但某些配置可能要等到下次啟動時才能生效。

trans-unit.source: The auxiliary process is busy and cannot respond to new requests, please wait patiently
trans-unit.target: 輔助進程很忙，無法響應新請求，請耐心等待

trans-unit.source: The latest update fixes some issues in the old version and provides functional enhancements

trans-unit.target: 由於無法讀取媒體文件或其他原因，無法加載媒體文件

trans-unit.target: 存儲位置丟失，必須重新設置

trans-unit.target: 無法將此窗口設置為最頂部

A mandatory update has been released, which indicates that the version you are using may have serious problems, please stop using the current version and update to the latest version as soon as possible

Please restart the application to activate the new font family. You can also continue to use this app, but the new font family may not take effect until the next time you start it

The tutorial on redirecting Win+E manually
Export the file used to close Win+E redirection manually
trans-unit.target: 導出用於手動關閉 Win+E 重定向的文件

trans-unit.source: Try to restore the application or import/export configuration files for later use
trans-unit.target: 嘗試恢復應用程序或導入/導出配置文件以備後用

trans-unit.source: Enabling this option will keep this app at the forefront of all windows
trans-unit.target: 啟用此選項將使此應用程序位於所有窗口的最前面

trans-unit.source: The app will start automatically with Windows starts after enabling this option
trans-unit.target: 啟用此選項後，該應用程序將隨 Windows 啟動而自動啟動

trans-unit.source: The file will be deleted permanently after enabling this option, please pay special attention to the risk of data loss
trans-unit.target: 啟用此選項後文件將被永久刪除，請特別注意數據丟失風險

trans-unit.source: Specify the preferred layout mode for all folders, unless the user has changed the layout mode of the path
trans-unit.target: 為所有文件夾指定首選佈局模式，除非用戶更改了路徑的佈局模式

trans-unit.source: Specify the default terminal application used in the context menu
trans-unit.target: 指定上下文菜單中使用的默認終端應用程序

trans-unit.source: A double confirmation dialog will pop up when the user deletes the file
trans-unit.target: 用戶刪除文件時會彈出雙重確認對話框

trans-unit.source: Balance file loading performance based on different options
trans-unit.target: 根據不同的選項平衡文件加載性能

trans-unit.source: Specify the font used by the application, need to restart to take effect
trans-unit.target: 指定應用程序使用的字體，需要重啟生效

trans-unit.source: Specify the language used by the application, need to restart to take effect
trans-unit.target: 指定應用程序使用的語言，需要重啟生效

trans-unit.source: View the privacy policy of this application
trans-unit.target: 查看此應用程序的隱私政策

trans-unit.source: Hidden files will be shown after enabling this option
trans-unit.target: 啟用此選項後將顯示隱藏文件

trans-unit.source: It is strongly recommended to keep this option selected, system files should not be modified or moved
trans-unit.target: 強烈建議保持選中此選項，不應修改或移動系統文件

trans-unit.source: Control the layout of the navigation view
A new process will always be opened when activated after enabling this option, otherwise it will only open a new tab
trans-unit.target: 啟用此選項後激活時將始終打開一個新進程，否則只會打開一個新選項卡

trans-unit.source: Control whether animation effects are enabled for each component in the application
trans-unit.target: 控制是否為應用中的每個組件啟用動畫效果

trans-unit.source: The menu items of third-party programs in the system will be obtained after enabling this option
trans-unit.target: 啟用該選項後，將獲得系統中第三方程序的菜單項

trans-unit.source: Specify search engine configuration, you can always use a specific configuration or ask every time
trans-unit.target: 指定搜索引擎配置，您可以一直使用特定配置或每次詢問

trans-unit.source: Customize the appearance of the application
trans-unit.target: 自定義應用程序的外觀

trans-unit.source: The last 25 visit records will be saved after enabling this option
trans-unit.target: 啟用此選項後將保存最近25條訪問記錄

trans-unit.source: The last 25 search records will be saved after enabling this option
trans-unit.target: 啟用此選項後將保存最近25條搜索記錄

trans-unit.source: A preview of the tab will be displayed when the mouse hovers over the title after enabling this option
trans-unit.target: 啟用此選項後，當鼠標懸停在標題上時，將顯示選項卡的預覽

trans-unit.source: Control whether to display the navigation pane located on the left side of the application
trans-unit.target: 控制是否顯示位於應用程序左側的導航窗格

trans-unit.source: Shortcut [Win+E] will be intercepted and redirected to this application after enabling this option
trans-unit.target: 啟用該選項後，快捷鍵[Win+E]將被攔截並重定向到該應用程序

trans-unit.source: Provide options related to the integration of this application and system components
trans-unit.target: 提供與此應用程序和系統組件集成相關的選項

trans-unit.source: Use this application as the default program for the folder after enabling this option
trans-unit.target: 啟用此選項後將此應用程序用作文件夾的默認程序

trans-unit.source: Intercepted and used as the default program for the folder
trans-unit.target: 攔截並用作文件夾的默認程序

trans-unit.source: This feature will modify the system registry file to achieve the corresponding purpose. Please pay special attention: Since it is impossible to automatically restore the modified system files before uninstalling, you must turn off this feature before uninstalling after you enable this function, otherwise the system will work abnormally. After you click Continue, you are deemed to have carefully read the above statement and authorized to modify the system files. This application does not assume any responsibility for violating this statement.
trans-unit.target: 此功能將修改系統註冊表文件以達到相應的目的。 請特別注意：由於卸載前無法自動恢復修改後的系統文件，啟用此功能後卸載前必須關閉此功能，否則係統將無法正常工作。 點擊繼續後，即視為您已仔細閱讀以上聲明，並有權修改系統文件。 本應用不對違反本聲明的行為承擔任何責任。

trans-unit.source: I have read the above statement carefully and bear the consequences of violating the statement
trans-unit.target: 我已仔細閱讀以上聲明，並承擔違反聲明的後果

trans-unit.source: Unable to perform the requested operation due to an exception
trans-unit.target: 由於錯誤無法執行請求的操作

trans-unit.source: Export the file used to turn off the folder redirection by yourself
trans-unit.target: 自己導出用來關閉文件夾重定向的文件

trans-unit.target: 單擊以向開發人員發送電子郵件
通過電子郵件聯繫開發者

trans-unit.source: File extensions will be shown after enabling this option
trans-unit.target: 啟用此選項後，將顯示文件擴展名

trans-unit.source: Allow files on this drive to have contents indexed in addition to file properties
trans-unit.target: 除了文件属性外，还允许索引此驱动器上的文件内容

trans-unit.source: Compress this drive to save disk space
trans-unit.target: 壓縮此驅動器以節省磁盤空間

trans-unit.source: Apply to the root directory of drive only
trans-unit.target: 仅適用于驱动器根目录

trans-unit.source: Apply to all sub-files and sub-folders
trans-unit.target: 適用於所有子文件和子文件夾

trans-unit.source: Clean up files that are no longer needed to save disk space and increase disk speed
trans-unit.target: 清理不再需要的文件以節省磁盤空間並提高磁盤速度

trans-unit.source: This option will check the drive for file system errors
trans-unit.target: 此選項將檢查驅動器是否存在文件系統錯誤

trans-unit.source: Optimizing the computer's disk drive can make it run more efficiently
trans-unit.target: 優化計算機的磁盤驅動器可以使其運行更高效

trans-unit.source: This option will find and terminate the program that locks this file
trans-unit.target: 此選項將查找並終止鎖定此文件的程序

trans-unit.source: Verify the hash value to ensure that the files are exactly the same
trans-unit.target: 驗證哈希值以確保文件完全相同

trans-unit.source: Enabling this option will prevent the menu from popping up until all menu items have finished loading. Note: This option will have a significant effect on the speed at which the context menu pops up
trans-unit.target: 啟用此選項將阻止菜單彈出，直到所有菜單項完成加載。 注意：此選項將對上下文菜單彈出的速度產生顯著影響

trans-unit.source: Wait for menu items to finish loading before popping up
trans-unit.target: 在彈出之前等待菜單項完成加載

trans-unit.source: Remember my choice and don't remind me next time
trans-unit.target: 記住我的選擇，下次不要提醒我

trans-unit.source: Trying to close the application, do you want to do this?
trans-unit.target: 試圖關閉應用程序，您要這樣做嗎？

trans-unit.source: Unable to open this image file
This file type is not supported
File do not exist and cannot be renamed
trans-unit.target: 文件不存在，無法重命名

trans-unit.source: Enabling this option will load the WSL folder on startup. Note: Loading the WSL folder will cause a certain degree of performance loss. When connecting to the WSL folder, we need to start the corresponding WSL virtual machine at the same time
trans-unit.target: 啟用此選項將在啟動時加載 WSL 文件夾。 注意：加載 WSL 文件夾會造成一定程度的性能損失。 連接WSL文件夾時，我們需要同時啟動對應的WSL虛擬機

trans-unit.source: Enabling this option will automatically share data to analyze and improve the app. The shared content includes logs related to key exceptions and crashes. The data may contain related information such as paths or file names. If this information is very sensitive and important to you, you can use this option to safely close data sharing
trans-unit.target: 啟用此選項將自動共享數據以分析和改進應用程序。 共享內容包括與關鍵異常和崩潰相關的日誌。 數據可能包含相關信息，例如路徑或文件名。 如果此信息對您非常敏感和重要，您可以使用此選項安全地關閉數據共享

trans-unit.source: Share data to improve this application
trans-unit.target: 共享數據以改進此應用程序

trans-unit.target: 由於未知錯誤，操作無法完成

trans-unit.target: 指定了不受支持的圖像格式

trans-unit.source: Unable to save file due to unknown error

trans-unit.target: 由於未知錯誤，無法編輯視頻文件

trans-unit.target: 由於未知錯誤，無法合併視頻文件

trans-unit.target: FTP 服務器不允許匿名登錄

trans-unit.target: 無法連接到 ftp 服務器
與 Windows 資源管理器的菜單集成

trans-unit.source: Enabling this option will add an "Open with RX-Explorer" menu item to the Windows Explorer to launch this application faster
trans-unit.target: 啟用此選項將在 Windows 資源管理器中添加“使用 RX-Explorer 打開”菜單項，以更快地啟動此應用程序

trans-unit.source: Unable to connect to target device
Customize the label color and the labels according to your personal preferences
trans-unit.target: 根据您的个人喜好定制标签颜色和标签

trans-unit.source: Please enter the text you wish to use
trans-unit.target: 請輸入您要使用的文字

trans-unit.source: The text file has several different terminators, so the text will be automatically unified to CRLF when saved
trans-unit.target: 文本文件有幾個不同的終止符，所以文本保存時會自動統一為CRLF

trans-unit.source: Could not resize images with too small resolution
trans-unit.target: 無法調整分辨率過小的圖像

trans-unit.source: Customize the default behavior of the close button
trans-unit.target: 自定義關閉按鈕的默認行為

trans-unit.source: Specify the default behavior of the close button to avoid closing the application accidentally
trans-unit.target: 指定關閉按鈕的默認行為以避免意外關閉應用程序

trans-unit.source: Specify the limit of the number of vertical split views displayed at the same time, and the excess part needs to be accessed by scrolling. Note: Adjusting this setting is only recommended on wider screens, otherwise the contents of each view may become unrecognizable
trans-unit.target: 指定同時顯示的垂直分割視圖的數量限制，超出部分需要滾動訪問。 注意：僅建議在更寬的屏幕上調整此設置，否則每個視圖的內容可能會變得無法識別

trans-unit.source: We have tried to restore the previous state!
trans-unit.target: 我們已經嘗試恢復之前的狀態!

trans-unit.source: RX crashes due to UWP framework or other unexpected exceptions
trans-unit.target: RX 因UWP框架或其他意外異常而崩潰

trans-unit.source: RX has stopped responding due to UWP framework or other reasons
trans-unit.target: RX由於 UWP 框架或其他原因已停止響應

trans-unit.source: When this option is enabled, a daemon process will be used to continuously monitor the running status of this application. Note: It is recommended to enable this option to maximize reliability
trans-unit.target: 啟用此選項後，將使用一個守護進程持續監控此應用程序的運行狀態。 注意：建議啟用此選項以最大限度地提高可靠性

trans-unit.source: Enabling this option will allow the daemon process to restart the app once it detects a crash and restore the folder user was browsing before
trans-unit.target: 啟用此選項將允許守護進程在檢測到崩潰後重新啟動應用程序並恢復用戶之前瀏覽的文件夾

trans-unit.source: Recover and restart the app when it crashes
trans-unit.target: 崩潰時恢復並重新啟動應用程序

trans-unit.source: Enabling this option will allow the daemon process to restart the app once it detects a freeze and restore the folder user was browsing before
trans-unit.target: 啟用此選項將允許守護進程在檢測到凍結後重新啟動應用程序並恢復用戶之前瀏覽的文件夾

trans-unit.source: Recover and restart the app when it freezes
trans-unit.target: 凍結時恢復並重新啟動應用程序

trans-unit.source: Adjust the layout space to give the layout a loose or compact appearance according to your preference. Note: This setting only takes effect for the "Details" and "List" layout
trans-unit.target: 根據您的喜好調整佈局空間以使佈局具有鬆散或緊湊的外觀。 注意：此設置僅對“詳細信息”和“列表”佈局生效

trans-unit.source: When this option is enabled, the navigation pane will follow and expand to the current folder location. Note: This may result in a larger performance impact and consume more time when accessing deeper folders, please enable this option at your own discretion
trans-unit.target: 啟用此選項後，導航窗格將跟隨並擴展到當前文件夾位置。 注意: 這可能會導致更大的性能影響並在訪問更深的文件夾時消耗更多時間，請自行決定啟用此選項

trans-unit.source: When this option is enabled, an aggregated virtual folder of all label files will be displayed under the Quick Access node
trans-unit.target: 啟用此選項後，所有標籤文件的聚合虛擬文件夾將顯示在快速訪問節點下

trans-unit.source: Show label folders in Quick Access node
trans-unit.target: 在快速訪問節點中顯示標籤文件夾

trans-unit.source: Seer is a quick view tool for Windows platform. Just like in MacOS, but Seer runs faster, is more customizable, and supports more formats. To enable this feature, you must install Seer in advance and ensure that Seer is running properly. You can activate Seer by selecting any file in the RX-Explorer and pressing the space bar
trans-unit.target: Seer是一款適用於Windows平台的快速查看工具。 就像在MacOS中一樣，但Seer運行速度更快，更可定制，並且支持更多格式。 要啟用此功能，您必須提前安裝Seer，並確保Seer運行正常。 您可以通過在RX-Explorer中選擇任何文件並按空格鍵來激活Seer

trans-unit.source: Choose the appropriate operating habits according to your preferences
trans-unit.target: 根據自己的喜好選擇合適的操作習慣

trans-unit.source: Change the default program by specifying the priority. Note: Valid only on types which the user has not specified a default program
trans-unit.target: 通過指定優先級來更改默認程序。 注意: 僅對用戶未指定默認程序的類型有效

trans-unit.source: Choose the operating habit according to your preferences
trans-unit.target: 根據您的喜好選擇操作習慣

trans-unit.source: Enabling this option will open the selected folder in a new tab. Opens the built-in viewer in a new tab if the file type is supported by the built-in viewer and the built-in viewer is the default program for that type
trans-unit.target: 啟用此選項將在新選項卡中打開所選文件夾。 如果內置查看器支持文件類型並且內置查看器是該類型的默認程序，則在新選項卡中打開內置查看器

trans-unit.source: Always open selected files and folders in a new tab
trans-unit.target: 始終在新選項卡中打開選定的文件和文件夾

trans-unit.source: Specifies the default behavior when dragging files with other applications
trans-unit.target: 指定與其他應用程序拖動文件時的默認行為

trans-unit.source: This option controls whether double-clicking on empty space to go back to the parent folder is enabled
trans-unit.target: This option controls whether double-clicking on empty space to go back to the parent folder is enabled

trans-unit.source: Double click on empty space to go back to parent folder
trans-unit.target: 此選項控制是否啟用雙擊空白空間以返回父文件夾

trans-unit.source: The configuration file being imported is not from the current computer. Importing configuration files from unknown sources may pose a security risk. Do you want to continue importing?
trans-unit.target: 導入的配置文件不是來自當前計算機。 從未知來源導入配置文件可能會帶來安全風險。 是否要繼續導入？

trans-unit.source: Please restart the app to activate the new UI style. It is not recommended that you continue to use this app, the new UI style will take effect at the next launch
trans-unit.target: 請重新啟動應用程序以激活新的 UI 樣式。 不建議您繼續使用此應用，新的UI樣式將在下次啟動時生效

trans-unit.source: This option is used to switch between "Regular" and "Minimalistic" styles. Note: Changing this option will require a restart of the application
trans-unit.target: 此選項用於在“常規”和“簡約”樣式之間切換。 注意：更改此選項將需要重新啟動應用程序
